subject: Global Express Cargo Internati
body:
Global Express Cargo International (Carlos Ave, Ontario, CA 91761, N
United States).
Good Day Sir/ Mir
Global Express is a well-established company offering courier and
transport services 24 hours for priority delivery of letters, parcels
and consignments to any destination by road, air or sea.
INSTRUCTIONS TO DELIVER YOUR PACKAGE.
Attn Sole Beneficiary For Fund Worth $7.4 Million USD, CASH delivery
This serves as urgent notice. Your Waybill, by Global  express courier
delivery company (USA)
The management of Global express Courier Company wishes to inform you
that your shipment was stopped at Bechtelsville, Pennsylvania USA on
Friday, since last week due to lack of clearance documentation
and during our correspondent to the Custom Authority they requested
for some vital document to enhance the immediate release of your
shipment to you worth the sum of $7.4 million usd.
Confirm the below information to this office.
Full Name:
Country:
Home Address:
Phone number:
Occupation:
Age:
We are definitely expecting your urgent response to enhance the
immediate release of your shipment today.
Regardsm,
MR.Donanld Moore
Phone Numbder:: +1 3056764770.
Director Shipment Office

subject: Re: Global Express Cargo Internati
body:
Hello Mr. Moore,

Thank you for reaching out and providing this information about Global Express Courier Company. It's great to hear that your company offers such comprehensive courier and transport services.

I'm a bit surprised to hear about the shipment being stopped due to lack of clearance. Could you please provide more details on what kind of vital documents are required by the Custom Authority? 

Also, could you clarify what exactly is in the shipment worth million USD? I wasn't expecting any package of such value.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Donald
